title: What is the worst high-end GPU? - Quora

response.answer_text: Voodoo 5 6000  It needed its own power adapter instead of getting power from computer case for some models.It had too many cooler fansNot enough productionno transform & lighting on gpu = there is cpu bottleneck3dfx was gone before this card reached full support(before having HW&TL on Rampage)had at least 5 revisionsit was not a full 128MB card but a 32MB-per-GPU cardVoodoo 3 series box was better:Voodoo 5 6000 box: Voodo 3 series box But, positive sides weren’t light compared to downsides above: first 3dfx graphics chip to support full 32-bit color depthfirst time the texture limit increased from 256x256 to 2kx2ktexture compressionhardware accelerated motion blur and (8X) anti aliasing (T-buffer)Up to 32 CHIPS PER GRAPHICS CARD scalability. 3dfx planned good for a future-proof design like AMD doing today on Epyc?It was also the most high end.Its backbone “Glide API” was making it even faster! Many games were using it.Now its a good collectors’ piece.Those years were “fast” in terms of development of new series of GPUs and incrementing speed but still you could compare this card with a card that was released at least 2 years later: It is not easy to be the best and the worst at the same time.
